analysis.description: Sansara.bytesToAddress (/unique_chucks/9/0x2c867dfcdc68006a66736194f46f280dcb3410a9.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Sansara.addInvestors (/unique_chucks/9/0x2c867dfcdc68006a66736194f46f280dcb3410a9.sol#59-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- investors[_addr[i]].deposit == 0
txs in Sansara.payout (/unique_chucks/9/0x2c867dfcdc68006a66736194f46f280dcb3410a9.sol#146) is a local variable never initialiazed

Sansara.payout has external calls inside a loop:
	- addr.send(amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x2c867dfcdc68006a66736194f46f280dcb3410a9.sol#167-169)
Parameter '_addr' of Sansara.addInvestors (/unique_chucks/9/0x2c867dfcdc68006a66736194f46f280dcb3410a9.sol#59) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_deposit' of Sansara.addInvestors (/unique_chucks/9/0x2c867dfcdc68006a66736194f46f280dcb3410a9.sol#59-60) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_date' of Sansara.addInvestors (/unique_chucks/9/0x2c867dfcdc68006a66736194f46f280dcb3410a9.sol#60) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_referrer' of Sansara.addInvestors (/unique_chucks/9/0x2c867dfcdc68006a66736194f46f280dcb3410a9.sol#60-61) is not in mixedCase
